title: Whole blood, healthy controls, biological rep1
source_name_ch1: Whole blood from healthy controls
treatment_protocol_ch1: Whole blood and paired tumor tissues and adjacent normal mucosa were obtained from healthy controls/colorectal cancer patients admitted to University of Malaya Medical Centre.
extract_protocol_ch1: Ribopure Blood RNA Isolation Kit  (Ambion, Austin, TX) and Qiagen miRNeasy Mini Kit (Qiagen, Valencia, CA) were used in the extraction of total RNA from whole blood and tissue samples, respectively.
label_protocol_ch1: Total RNA (1 ug) was biotin-labeled using Flashtag Biotin HSR RNA Labeling Kit (Genisphere, Hatfield, PA).
hyb_protocol: The samples were hybridized to GeneChip miRNA 2.0 arrays at 48C and 60 rpm for 16hours in the Affymetrix Hybridization Oven 640. The arrays were washed and stained on Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
scan_protocol: GeneChips were scanned with GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G.
data_processing: The data were analyzed using GeneSpring GX 12.0 software (Agilent Technologies, Santa Clara, CA). ). Robust multichip averaging (RMA) algorithm was applied and the normalized data were filtered at p value and fold change cut off of 0.05 and 1.5, respectively
contact_address: Faculty of Medicine, University of Malaya
